Question: A self-professed "liberal on civil rights", this person has stated that he is pro-choice on abortion.
Hints: Governor Schwarzenegger appointed this person to the California Film Commission in April 2004.
This person played one of a group of veteran ex-test pilots sent into space to repair an old Soviet satellite.
This person once again played a mysterious stranger—unshaven, wearing a serape-like vest, and smoking a cigar.
